events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position. Thank you for your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering cluster based on your skills and experience mentioned.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your application and will reach out to you soon for the next steps.
We conducted an initial screening based on your resume and coding experience, and we are pleased to inform you that you qualify for the technical interview stage.
Thank you for confirming your availability for the upcoming technical interview. We appreciate your prompt and enthusiastic response.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 16th at 10:00 AM UTC with our senior software engineers. Please prepare the necessary materials.
The technical interview was completed successfully. The panel was impressed with your problem-solving skills and coding proficiency.
We have scheduled your HR interview for April 20th at 2:00 PM UTC to discuss your career goals and company culture fit.
Your HR interview went very well, and the HR team is happy with your communication and alignment with our company values.
We are excited to extend you a formal job offer for the Software Engineer role, including a competitive salary and benefits package.
We received your positive feedback and acceptance of the job offer. We look forward to welcoming you to our engineering team.
You have officially accepted the offer. Congratulations on becoming part of our engineering team!
Your onboarding process has started. We are excited to provide all required resources to get you fully integrated with our engineering workflows.
The hiring process is now complete. Welcome aboard as an official member of our software development team.
